Name: Square Knight
About the game: Dodge obstacles, kill monsters, and collect coins. Use your coins wisely, you can level up, reset your status points, heal your HP or buy extra lives. Each level you up, you gain a status point. With these, you can choose which status you want to upgrade. There isn't a max level, by the way, you will level up how many times you can. Level up will help you A LOT .
